sources.title: Affairs of Cappy Ricks (1937)
sources.description: Cappy Ricks, a crusty old sea captain, returns home from a long voyage to discover that his family and his business are in chaos--his daughter is set to marry a nitwit that he can't stand, and his future mother-in-law has taken over everything and is set to merge his business with that of a rival company. Worst of all, though, is that she--in the interests of "progress"--has completely automated his beloved ship, "Electra"!. He sets out to put an end to all this foolishness and comes up with what he thinks is a foolproof plan. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/affairs-of-cappy-ricks-1937/

sources.title: Affairs of Cappy Ricks
sources.description: Cappy Ricks and his family are stranded on a south sea island, and there his daughters learn that their choice of future husbands is faulty. Based on a story by Peter B. Kyne. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Affairs of Cappy Ricks
sources.description: Cappy Ricks returns home after a long sea voyage and finds his daughter is about to marry an idiotic whelp whose mother has taken over his home and business.

sources.title: Affairs of Cappy Ricks
sources.channelName: Public Domain Movies - Classic Old Movies

Worst of all, though, is that she--in the interests of "progress"--has completely automated his beloved ship, "Electra"!. He sets out to put an end to all this foolishness and comes up with what he thinks is a foolproof plan.
